sentences.en: Babies and very old people totter as they walk.
sentences.cn: 小孩与老年人走路蹒跚.

sentences.en: Just a few more days, till we totter in the road!
sentences.cn: 再过几天, 我们将蹒跚着走上大路!

sentences.en: Lorrimer swayed a little, tottered, and fell.
sentences.cn: 洛里默身体微微摇晃，蹒跚几步后跌倒在地。

sentences.en: Teeter - totter caught up bein a father and a prima donna.
sentences.cn: 当爸和挣钱回家不知顾哪头才好.

sentences.en: They adorn it with and gold it with hammer and nails so it will not totter.
sentences.cn: 他们用金银妆饰它,用钉子和锤子钉稳,使它不动摇.

sentences.en: To shake or tremble, as from old age; totter.
sentences.cn: 因年老而颤抖; 蹒跚而行.

trans.tran_cn: 蹒跚, 踉跄, 动摇, 摇摇欲坠
trans.tran_en: to walk or move unsteadily from side to side as if you are going to fall over
